pageDesc: I'm Parker Phelps, a freelance web developer/designer proudly serving Winston-Salem, Greensboro, High Point, and Mt. Airy under the banner of 'CodingTheFront.' Specializing in affordable and innovative web solutions, I bring your digital vision to life with responsive websites, user-friendly interfaces, and e-commerce development. Explore the CodingTheFront portfolio, read through client testimonials, and elevate your online presence with a local expert committed to client satisfaction.
